item.title: Morgan add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Morgan add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Morgan add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Morgan add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Morgan add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Morgan add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Morgan add a quote by A.A. Milne
Morgan add a quote by Elbert Hubbard
item.description: "A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you." -- Elbert Hubbard

item.title: Morgan add a quote by Henri Nouwen
item.description: "When we honestly ask ourselves which person in our lives mean the most to us, we often find that it is those who, instead of giving advice, solutions, or cures, have chosen rather to share our pain and touch our wounds with a warm and tender hand. The friend who can be silent with us in a moment of despair or confusion, who can stay with us in an hour of grief and bereavement, who can tolerate not knowing, not curing, not healing and face with us the reality of our powerlessness, that is a friend who cares." -- Henri Nouwen

item.title: Morgan add a quote by Marlene Dietrich
item.description: "It's the friends you can call up at 4 a.m. that matter." -- Marlene Dietrich

item.title: Morgan add a quote by Alfred Lord Tennyson
item.description: "If I had a flower for every time I thought of you...I could walk through my garden forever." -- Alfred Lord Tennyson

item.title: Morgan add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "Life is an awful, ugly place to not have a best friend." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Morgan add a quote by Muhammad Ali
item.description: "Friendship is the hardest thing in the world to explain. It's not something you learn in school. But if you haven't learned the meaning of friendship, you really haven't learned anything." -- Muhammad Ali

item.title: Morgan add a quote by Helen Keller
item.description: "I would rather walk with a friend in the dark, than alone in the light." -- Helen Keller

item.title: Morgan add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Friendship is born at that moment when one man says to another: "What! You too? I thought that no one but myself . . .&#34;" -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Morgan add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "We'll be Friends Forever, won't we, Pooh?' asked Piglet. Even longer,' Pooh answered." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Morgan add a quote by Margaret Lee Runbeck
item.description: "Silence make the real conversations between friends. Not the saying, but the never needing to say that counts." -- Margaret Lee Runbeck

item.title: Morgan add a quote by Amos Bronson Alcott
item.description: "Stay is a charming word in a friend's vocabulary." -- Amos Bronson Alcott

item.title: Morgan add a quote by Jay McInerney
item.description: "The capacity for friendship is God's way of apologizing for our families." -- Jay McInerney

item.title: Morgan add a quote by George Herbert
item.description: "The best mirror is an old friend." -- George Herbert

item.title: Morgan add a quote by Arthur Brisbane
item.description: "A good friend can tell you what is the matter with you in a minute. He may not seem such a good friend after telling. " -- Arthur Brisbane

item.title: Morgan add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Morgan add a quote by Billy Sunday
item.description: "Going to church doesnâ€™t make you a Christian any more than going to a garage makes you an automobile." -- Billy Sunday

item.title: Morgan add a quote by Lemony Snicket
item.description: "Everyone should be able to do one card trick, tell two jokes, and recite three poems, in case they are ever trapped in an elevator." -- Lemony Snicket

item.title: Morgan add a quote by Cathy Guiswite
item.description: "When life gives you lemons, squirt someone in the eye." -- Cathy Guiswite

item.title: Morgan add a quote by Robert Benchley
item.description: "Opera is when a guy gets stabbed in the back and, instead of bleeding, he sings." -- Robert Benchley

item.title: Morgan add a quote by Chris Rock
item.description: "You know the world is going crazy when the best rapper is a white guy, the best golfer is a black guy, the tallest guy in the NBA is Chinese, the Swiss hold the America's Cup, France is accusing the U.S. of arrogance, Germany doesn't want to go to war, and the three most powerful men in America are named "Bush", "Dick", and "Colin." Need I say more?" -- Chris Rock

item.title: Morgan add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "It's not true that I had nothing on. I had the radio on." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Morgan add a quote by Cathy East Dubowski
item.description: "How dare you open a spaceman's helmet on an uncharted planet? My eyeballs could've been sucked from their sockets!" -- Cathy East Dubowski

item.title: Morgan add a quote by Rick Riordan
item.description: "She said this in the same way you might say Fields of Punishment or Hades's gym shorts." -- Rick Riordan
